metadata.title: CVE-2023-5625 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A regression was introduced in the Red Hat build of python-eventlet due toa change in the patch application strategy, resulting in a patch forCVE-2021-21419 not being applied for all builds of all products.

criterions.comment: python-eventlet: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
